languages.text: {n}Дознаватель убирает руки и мотает головой, словно силясь сбросить с себя морок, его голос хрипит от напряжения.{/n} "Простое воздействие, для облегчения состояния. Соберитесь. Не поддавайтесь тому, что пытается овладеть вами".

{n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель убирает руки и мотает головой, словно силясь сбросить с себя морок, его голос хрипит от напряжения.{/n} "Простое воздействие, для облегчения состояния. Соберитесь. Не поддавайтесь тому, что пытается овладеть вами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head like he is trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles with tension when he says,{/n} "A simple influence to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to that which is trying to take hold of you."

{n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head like he is trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles with tension when he says,{/n} "A simple influence to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to that which is trying to take hold of you."

{n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to that which is trying to take hold of you."

{n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to that which is trying to take hold of you."

{n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

{n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix entfernt seine Hände und schüttelt den Kopf, als wolle er loswerden, was immer ihn bedrängt. Dann sagt er mit zitternder Stimme:{/n} "Eine simple Lösung, um Euren Zustand zu stabilisieren. Reißt Euch zusammen. Gebt der Kraft nicht nach, die versucht, die Kontrolle über Euch zu erlangen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix entfernt seine Hände und schüttelt den Kopf, als wolle er loswerden, was immer ihn bedrängt. Dann sagt er mit zitternder Stimme:{/n} "Eine simple Lösung, um Euren Zustand zu stabilisieren. Reißt Euch zusammen. Gebt der Kraft nicht nach, die versucht, die Kontrolle über Euch zu erlangen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix retire ses mains et secoue la tête, comme pour tenter de repousser ce qui l'assaille. Il explique alors d'une voix tremblante :{/n} « Une solution de fortune pour vous stabiliser. Restez {mf|concentré|concentrée}. Ne vous soumettez pas à la force qui cherche à vous contrôler. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix retire ses mains et secoue la tête, comme pour tenter de repousser ce qui l'assaille. Il explique alors d'une voix tremblante :{/n} « Une solution de fortune pour vous stabiliser. Restez {mf|concentré|concentrée}. Ne vous soumettez pas à ce qui cherche à vous contrôler. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希移开了双手，摇了摇头，似乎在努力赶走来袭的东西。他的声音颤抖着，开了口。{/n}“这是个简单的方法，可以稳定住你的情况。保持冷静，无论是什么力量打算控制你，都千万不能屈服。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希移开了双手，摇了摇头，似乎在努力赶走来袭的东西。他的声音颤抖着，开了口。{/n}“这是个简单的方法，可以稳定住你的情况。保持冷静，无论是什么东西打算控制你，都千万不能屈服。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは手を離し、攻撃するものを振り払うかのように頭を振る。話す声も震えている。{/n}「あなたの状態を安定させるのに、シンプルな方法が一つあります。頑張ることです。あなたを支配しようとする力に屈してはいけません」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは手を離し、攻撃するものを振り払うかのように頭を振る。話す声も震えている。{/n}「あなたの状態を安定させるのに、シンプルな方法が一つある。頑張ることだ。自分を支配しようとする力に屈するな」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix retira sus manos y sacude la cabeza como si intentara alejar algo que lo estuviera atacando. A continuación, dice, con voz temblorosa,{/n} «Una solución simple para estabilizar{mf|lo|la}. Céntrese, no ceda ante la fuerza que intenta apoderarse de usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix retira sus manos y sacude la cabeza como si intentara alejar algo que lo estuviera atacando. A continuación, dice, con voz temblorosa,{/n} «Una solución simple para estabilizar{mf|lo|la}. Céntrese, no ceda ante lo que intenta apoderarse de usted».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ellerini çekiyor ve kendisine dadanan her neyse uzaklaştırmaya çalışırcasına kafasını sallıyor. Sesi titrek çıkıyor.{/n} "Zihnini rahatlatacak geçici bir çare sadece. Metanetli ol. Seni ele geçirmeye çalışan kudrete teslim olma."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix removes his hands and shakes his head as if trying to drive away whatever is assailing him. His voice trembles when he says,{/n} "A simple solution to stabilise your condition. Keep it together. Do not give in to the force trying to take hold of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ellerini geri çekip zihnini işgal eden varlıktan uzaklaşmaya çalışırcasına kafasını sallıyor. Sesi titrek çıkıyor,{/n} "Seni sıhhatine kavuşturacak basit bir çare mevcut. Metanetli ol. Seni ele geçirmeye çalışan kudrete yenik düşme."
